response.overview: An enigmatic character, with wicked intent, welcomes himself into a gathering of clergy and sets forth a series of events that has even God's most humble servants questioning their faith. Damien, invites himself to a private breakfast being held by multiple members of the clergy. While there, Damien, with malicious intentions, focuses on Elijah, a man of the cloth who struggles to suppress his homosexual thoughts. With the use of jaw dropping comments, Damien forces each of God's servants to take a look at their values and ask whether they are personal commitments or simply personal inheritances.
response.title: Indoctrination
